description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs
notes:
This appears to be an introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint. Key information extracted includes:

1. Language Support: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย

2. Main Features:
- Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing
- Push notification services
- Developer services including onboarding, testing, and maintenance
- API testing tools and sandbox environments

3. Target Users:
- Software service providers
- Sellers with software development capabilities

4. The page contains navigation menu items but no specific API endpoint documentation is visible in this chunk.

documentation_sections.title: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
documentation_sections.content_summary: Quick access to shop data, multi-market support

documentation_sections.title: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?
documentation_sections.content_summary: Two types of developers: software service providers and sellers with development capabilities
